description: Detects a suspicious copy command to or from an Admin share Author: Florian Roth, oscd.community, Teymur Kheirkhabarov @HeirhabarovT, Zach Stanford @svch0st. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Copy from Admin Share
query: (((process.executable:(*\\robocopy.exe OR *\\xcopy.exe) OR (process.executable:*\\cmd.exe AND process.command_line:*copy*)) OR (process.executable:*\\powershell* AND process.command_line:(*copy\-item* OR *copy* OR *cpi\ * OR *\ cp\ *))) AND (process.command_line:*\\\\\* AND process.command_line:*$*))
